options.name: Action : Calm Beast
options.description: You target a Hostile Beast and attempt to calm it by making an Animal Check against a Required Check of 3 + the Level of the Beast. If successful, the Creature is considered Charmed by you for 1 Hour where it will attempt to follow your commands to the best of its ability. Only one Beast can be Charmed in this way at a time.

options.name: Tamer
options.description: Your Maximum Pet Level for Beasts becomes equal to your Level - 2 with a minimum of 2.

options.name: Unburdened Pet
options.description: Your Pets are not subjected to the Pet Action Limits and can utilize their full Statblock.

options.name: Durable Pet
options.description: Your Pets gain maximum Health equal to your Level and +2 Physical Mitigation.

options.name: Extra Pet
options.description: The maximum amount of Pets you can have is increased by 1. Additionally, you can keep one Level 0 Pet that does not count against your Pet limit.
